chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The cat hid in the flowers of the rice field from the wild dogs.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "豸" and " miao ", it means that domestic cats, mammals, have slightly rounded faces, slightly longer torso, shorter limbs, strong night vision, good temperament, and many people and animals to catch rats. "Said Wen": "The genus raccoon. Congzhe, Miaosheng." "Book of Rites-Jiao Special Sacrifice": "Welcome the cat, and eat voles.

" Cat " also means civet cat, that is, bobcat. "Poetry·Daya·Han Yi": "There are bears, there are wars, there are cats and there are tigers." Mao Chuan: "Cats are like tigers with light fur." Ma Ruichen explained: "Cats, cover are now commonly known as lynx."

In modern Chinese dialects, " cat " can be used as a verb to indicate hiding, as in the Mandarin Chinese "cat in a box".
humanum_short_description_en: From "豸" to " miao " sound, it means domestic cat.
humanum_full_description:
從「豸」，「苗」聲，表示家貓，哺乳動物，面部略圓，軀幹稍長，四肢較短，夜視力強，品性馴良，人多畜之以捕鼠。《說文》：「貍屬。从豸，苗聲。」《禮記‧郊特牲》：「迎貓，為其食田鼠也。」

　　「貓」也表示貍貓，即山貓。《詩‧大雅‧韓奕》：「有熊有羆，有貓有虎。」毛傳：「貓，似虎淺毛者也。」馬瑞辰通釋：「貓，蓋即今俗稱山貓者。」

　　現代漢語方言中「貓」可用作動詞，表示躲藏，如官話「貓在箱子裡」。

Kind: traditional

從「 豸 」，「 苗 」聲，表示家貓，哺乳動物，面部略圓，軀幹稍長，四肢較短，夜視力強，品性馴良，人多畜之以捕鼠。《說文》：「貍屬。从豸，苗聲。」《禮記‧郊特牲》：「迎貓，為其食田鼠也。」 「 貓 」也表示貍貓，即山貓。《詩‧大雅‧韓奕》：「有熊有羆，有貓有虎。」毛傳：「貓，似虎淺毛者也。」馬瑞辰通釋：「貓，蓋即今俗稱山貓者。」 現代漢語方言中「 貓 」可用作動詞，表示躲藏，如官話「貓在箱子裡」。
From the sound of " 豸" and " miao", it means that domestic cats, mammals, have slightly rounded faces, slightly longer torso, shorter limbs, strong night vision, good temperament, and many people and animals to catch rats. "Said Wen": "The genus raccoon. Congzhe, Miaosheng." "Book of Rites-Jiao Special Sacrifice": "Welcome the cat, and eat voles. " Cat" also means civet cat, that is, bobcat. "Poetry·Daya·Han Yi": "There are bears, there are wars, there are cats and there are tigers." Mao Chuan: "Cats are like tigers with light fur." Ma Ruichen explained: "Cats, cover are now commonly known as lynx." In modern Chinese dialects, " cat" can be used as a verb to indicate hiding, as in the Mandarin Chinese "cat in a box".

貓字的基本解释

貓
māo
同“猫”。

貓
máo
同“猫”。

貓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［māo］
［《廣韻》莫交切，平肴，明。］
［《廣韻》武瀌切，平宵，明。］
同“猫1”。亦作“猫1”。
(1)称家猫。哺乳动物。面部略圆，躯干长，四肢较短，掌部有肉垫，行动敏捷，善跳跃；瞳孔大小能随光线强弱而变化，虽处暗夜中视力亦极好；且性驯良，故人多畜之以捕鼠。
(2)狸猫，亦称山猫。
(3)方言。停留；躲藏。
[②]［máo］
同“猫1”。
(1)见“貓2牛”。
(2)用同“錨”。船只的停泊设备，多以铁制。
(3)指腰部向前弯曲。
[③]［miáo］
同“苗1”。
旧时指苗族。

貓字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豸字部】　貓； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1202第30
【廣韻】武鑣切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】眉鑣切，?音苗。【說文】貍屬。【廣韻】獸，捕䑕。【禮·郊特牲】迎貓，爲其食田䑕也。【正字通】陸佃曰：䑕善害苗。貓能捕䑕，故字从苗。又貓睛，子午卯酉如一線，寅申巳亥如滿月，辰戌丑未如棗核。鼻端常冷，惟夏至一日暖，隂類也。又《格古論》貓，一名烏員。　又【爾雅·釋獸】虎竊毛，謂之虦貓。【疏】虎之淺毛者，別名虦貓。【詩·大雅】有貓有虎。【傳】貓，似虎淺毛者也。　又【唐韻】莫交切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】謨交切，?音茅。義同。　【廣韻】俗作猫。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [māo]
["Guangyun" must not be cross-cut, flat food, bright. ]
["Guangyun" Wu Huang cut, Ping Xiao, Ming. ]
Same as "Cat 1". Also known as "Cat 1".
(1) It is called a domestic cat. mammal. The face is slightly round, the torso is long, the limbs are short, the palms are cushioned, the action is agile, and the jump is good; the pupil size can change with the intensity of the light, and the vision is excellent even in the dark; and the sex is good, so there are many people and animals To catch mice.
(2) Tanuki, also known as lynx.
(3) Dialects. Stay; hide.
[②]［máo］
Same as "Cat 1".
(1) See "Cat 2 Cattle".
(2) Use the same "anchor". The mooring equipment for ships is mostly made of iron.
(3) Refers to the forward bending of the waist.
[③]［miáo］
Same as "Miao 1".
It used to refer to the Miao nationality.
